name: Inkdom
description: The DSA's 2021 - 2022 game! Inkdom is a RPG rogulike that follows the character Finn through colorful Inkdoms full of humorous lore and adventure. Finn is stuck in the " Clear World" ink cartridge inside a printer and must collect  ink from the other CMYK cartridges called "Inkdoms". However along the way Finn has to collect powerful Pantone cards to play and use against enemies protecting the very ink that Finn needs to return color to their world. Best of luck and safe travels! Oh, and be careful what colors you mix?!- DSA Interactive
